note.snippet: Pañhe-dhammaṃ vā tvaṃ adhiyassu vinayaṃ vā
Hetuphalesveyya eyyuṃ eyyāsi eyyātha eyyāmi eyyāma etha eraṃ etho eyyāvho

note.original: ka. 416; rū. 454; nī. 881-4; caṃ. 1.3.128; pā. 3.3.169-172; satyarahesveyyādī (bahūsu)

alternatives.alternative: ka. 416; rū. 454; nī. 881-4; caṃ. 1.3.128; pā. 3.3.169-172; satyarahesveyyādī

note.original: ka. 516; rū. 466; nī. 1030; caṃ. 1.2.76; pā. 3.2.110 aīssaādīnaṃ byañjanassiu (bahūsu)

alternatives.alternative: ka. 516; rū. 466; nī. 1030; caṃ. 1.2.76; pā. 3.2.110 aīssaādīnaṃ byañjanassiu

note.snippet: Eyyāthasseaāīthānaṃ o a aṃ ttha ttho vho vā

note.original: ka. 422; rū. 475; nī. 895; caṃ. 1.3.107; pā. 3.3.139; eyyādo vātipattiyaṃ (bahūsu)

alternatives.alternative: ka. 422; rū. 475; nī. 895; caṃ. 1.3.107; pā. 3.3.139; eyyādo vātipattiyaṃ

note.snippet: Eyyādotipattiyaṃ ssā ssaṃsu sse ssatha ssaṃ ssāmhā ssatha ssiṃsu ssase ssavhe ssiṃ ssāmhase

note.original: ‘sace pana nikkhamitvā pabbajissa, arahattaṃ pāpuṇissa’ (dhammapada aṭṭha. 1)
note.snippet: Tattha atītāyaṃ-sace so paṭhamavaye pabbajjaṃ alabhissā, arahā abhavissā

note.original: ka. 571, 517; rū. 624, 488; nī. 830, 1105; ‘atthiteyyādicchannaṃ sasusasatha saṃ sāma’ (bahūsu)

alternatives.alternative: ka. 571, 517; rū. 624, 488; nī. 830, 1105; ‘atthiteyyādicchannaṃ sasusasatha saṃ sāma’

note.snippet: Atthiteyyādichannaṃ sa su sasi satha saṃsāma

note.original: jātake ‘‘āmantayassu te putte, mā te mātara maddasuṃ’’

note.snippet: , satiṃ paccalatthuṃ, viparītasaññaṃ paccalatthuṃ, te satiṃ paccalatthaṃsu, agamamhā kho tava gehaṃ, tattha neva dānaṃ alatthamhā

note.original: ka. 481; rū. 524; nī. 963; ‘bhuja muca vaca visānaṃ kkhaṅa (bahūsu)

alternatives.alternative: ka. 481; rū. 524; nī. 963; ‘bhuja muca vaca visānaṃ kkhaṅa

note.snippet: , ime dhammā mayi sandissanti, ahañca imesu dhammesu sandissāmi
Susa-sussane, sussati. Aṭṭhi ca nhāru ca cammañca avasissatu, upasussatu me sarīre maṃsalohitaṃ

note.original: ka. 452; rū. 525; nī. 933; caṃ. 1.1.45; pā. 3.1.25; ‘curādito ṇi’ (bahūsu)

note.snippet: Su-savane, sotuṃ icchatīti atthe – dvitte parassa dvittaṃ, sussusati
